level.heading: Inside fire districts.
level.text: ยง 27-293 Inside fire districts. The following city areas are hereby established as being inside the fire districts: (a) All of the borough of Manhattan. (b) All of the borough of Bronx. (c) All of the borough of Brooklyn. (d) Such portions of the boroughs of Staten Island and Queens as are indicated on the "fire district maps" (reference standards RS4-1 and RS4-2).
